segments.text: You honestly believe the world ’ s improving every year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . I think that science is making us wiser . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t think you ’ re right there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe industry is making us wealthier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And in my opinion , medicine is making us healthier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree with you in the sense . But we ’ re all more miserable than ever , aren ’ t we ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t agree with you . I maintain that we ’ re healthier , wealthier and wiser than we were a hundred years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s your opinion not mine .
segments.speaker: S1
